## Nested causality

---

- Mind ($M$) within nervous system ($N$)
- Nervous system ($N$) within body ($N$)
- Body ($B$) within world ($W$)

## Mutual coupling of dynamic states

---

$\dot{M} = f(M,N)$

$\dot{N} = f(N,B)$

$\dot{B} = f(B,N,W)$

$\dot{W} = f(W,B)$

## Measure...

- $W$, $B$, $N$ **directly**
- At varied spatial & temporal scales
